pkgmetadata.longdescription: # jsw-pillow> Pillow for jsw.## installation```shellpip install jsw-pillow -U```## usage- watermark### Watermark> Watermark 水印的基本生成API。![Alt text](https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/large/008vxvgGgy1h7su9f3j8pj30uh0p6n1z.jpg)```python# watermarkfrom jsw_pillow import Watermark# watermark - singleim1 = Watermark.multiple( source='./__tests__/assets/test.png', mark='js.work', font_size=50, angle=45, position='center', color=(0, 255, 0, int(255 * 0.5)),)# watermark - multipleim2 = Watermark.multiple( source='./__tests__/assets/test.png', mark='js.work', font_size=50, angle=45, color=(0, 255, 0, int(255 * 0.5)),)```## positions> Only for single watermark.![Alt text](https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/large/008vxvgGgy1h7u1m6nmvkj30gh0evt92.jpg)
